@graph.name: Easy Vegan Cheesecake for 2 Glutenfree Oat Crust - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Cheesecake. Baked Vegan Cheesecake Recipe with Cashews and non dairy yogurt. Individual Cheesecake Tarts. Soy-free Gluten-free Recipe.

itemListElement.name: Easy Vegan Cheesecake for 2 Glutenfree Oat Crust

@graph.name: Vegan Cheesecake Baked
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Cheesecake. Baked Vegan Cheesecake Recipe with Cashews and non dairy yogurt. Soy-free Gluten-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup non dairy yogurt (I use kite hill almond plain yogurt)
1/3 cup soaked cashews (soaked for atleast 15 mins in hot water)
2 to 3 tsp lime juice or lemon juice

itemListElement.text: Add oat flour, almond flour, salt, cinnamon and oil to a bowl and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Add oat flour, almond flour, salt, cinnamon and oil to a bowl and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Add 1 tbsp maple syrup and mix in. Add more maple syrup about a 1/2 tsp at a time and mix to make a soft dough.
itemListElement.name: Add 1 tbsp maple syrup and mix in. Add more maple syrup about a 1/2 tsp at a time and mix to make a soft dough.

itemListElement.text: Press the dough into 2 tart pans or other 4.5 inch pans. (or 4 greased and bottom lined muffin pans)
itemListElement.name: Press the dough into 2 tart pans or other 4.5 inch pans. (or 4 greased and bottom lined muffin pans)

itemListElement.text: Blend all the ingredients until well blended. Taste and adjust sweet and tang and blend again.
itemListElement.name: Blend all the ingredients until well blended. Taste and adjust sweet and tang and blend again.

itemListElement.text: Pour the mixture into the prepared crust.
itemListElement.name: Pour the mixture into the prepared crust.

itemListElement.text: Bake a 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 to 45 minutes. Let it sit in the oven for another 10 minutes. Then cool on the counter for a few minutes. Refrigerate for atleast an hour before serving. Serve with whipped coconut cream or vegan vanilla ice cream
itemListElement.name: Bake a 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 40 to 45 minutes. Let it sit in the oven for another 10 minutes. Then cool on the counter for a few minutes. Refrigerate for atleast an hour before serving. Serve with whipped coconut cream or vegan vanilla ice cream
